steps: Break prompts into Scene 1 / Scene 2 segments

Call out audio cues (voice, ambience, FX)
Mention what should stay consistent (characters, wardrobe)

faqs.q: Can I use my own OpenAI key with Sora 2 Pro?
faqs.a: Yes. Enter your OpenAI API key before you render and billing is handled on your OpenAI account while MaxVideo routes the job.

faqs.q: Does Sora 2 Pro always output audio?
faqs.a: Audio is on by default for lip-sync and sound design, but you can toggle it off in the composer if you only need visuals.
